ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 8
ygData.msgSnippet: This is a recent change that occurred at the same time as the MipMap option for glide cards was added. Some other interesting effect include: polar bears in
ygData.messageBody:
This is a recent change that occurred at the same time as the MipMap option
for glide cards was added.
Some other interesting effect include:

polar bears in Everfrost now have patterns on their hides and snouts
the snow in everfrost is more detailed, there are snowbanks and "dimples" in
the snow
froglocks in qeynos have warts (how attractive #)
A lot of little details appeared with that last patch.

--------------------------------------
FireSong
firesong@...
--------------------------------------

----- Original Message -----
From: <_EQ_Magic@onelist.com>
To: <_EQ_Magic@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 08, 1999 08:33 AM
Subject: [_EQ_Magic] Digest Number 8


> After a recent summoning, I saw something on the elemental's body I
> haven't noticed to now. I keep remembering my elemental always having a
> pure white spot in the center. Now there is a sort of Up-down arrow in
> the middle of the spot. Does anybody know what this means?
>
> Kapolokok
>
